column1:
I just booked a trip to Miami and the price of the airfare was easily $150 less than it was two weeks ago.

The coronavirus does pay off in some ways.

Everyone is so infected with fear, they can’t even fathom uttering a counter view of the coronavirus because they’re hyper worried about the blowback.

if you don’t speak up during chaos, nothing will ever change.

At least Scott Adams does.
